comments:
Build ID: M20070212-1330

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Import the .JETEmitters project into the workspace using the General > Existing Projects into Workspace import wizard.
2. Close the .JETEmitters project.  You may need to adjust the default filters to see this project in the Navigator view.
3. Close Eclipse
4. Start Eclipse (ensure that -consoleLog is included in the program arguments) again, and the exception should be printed to the console.

More information:
Using build 200702082048 of WTP.

The following is a copy of the exception that is printed to the console:
